title: Torturous demonspawn
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{list of | demonspawn}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Torturous demonspawn''' are demonspawn with passive abilities similar to [[Powered by Pain]] (they may gain [[Might]] or [[Agility]]), and [[Augmentation]]. They can be found in the [[Pandemonium]].

==Tips & Tricks==

==History==
*Monstrous, gelid, infernal, and torturous demonspawn were removed in [[0.28]].
*Prior to [[0.26]], torturous demonspawn were [[spiny]].
*Torturous demonspawn were added in [[0.14]].

[[Category:Demonspawn]]
